other_tests.findings: Increased plasma (380 U/L) and CSF (7.3 U/L) ACE levels.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Plasma ACE levels were still increased (161 U/L), but there was no evidence of (neuro)sarcoidosis.

other_tests.date: First NCS, 2 weeks after extubation; Follow-up NCS, 10 weeks after extubation
other_tests.findings: First NCS showed abnormal amplitudes; Follow-up NCS showed similar amplitudes with absent H reflexes from bilateral tibial nerves.
